section.title: Figure Floats
section.para: Normally only one image is inserted to a figure float, but sometimes you might want to use two images with separate subcaptions. This can be done by inserting image floats into existing image floats. Note that only the main caption of the float is added to the List of Figures. Figure is an example of a figure float with two images set side by side. You can also set the images one below the other. Figure and are the subfigures.
